topic: Effective self-reflection techniques for professionals in the solar and energy sectors
content: Generated from lens processing: My working hypothesis is that I haven't been asking questions that challenge my current beliefs or assumptions, potentially hindering deeper personal growth. As a next step, I will set aside dedicated time each week to reflect on areas where I feel stagnant or dissatisfied and formulate specific questions aimed at exploring those areas more deeply. This practice will help uncover fresh insights and facilitate ongoing personal development.

metadata.trigger: What's a question I haven't asked myself in a while?
